00036 #include "KviKvsObject.h"

00039 class KVIRC_API KviKvsObjectController
00040 {
00041         friend class KviKvsObject;
00042         friend class KviKvsObjectClass;
00043 public:
00044         KviKvsObjectController();
00045         ~KviKvsObjectController();
00046 protected:
00047         KviPointerList<KviKvsObject>      * m_pTopLevelObjectList;
00048         KviPointerHashTable<void *,KviKvsObject>        * m_pObjectDict;
00049         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsObjectClass>      * m_pClassDict;
00050         KviKvsObjectClass             * m_pObjectClass; //base class
00051 protected:
00052         // the classes and the objects register themselves with the controller
00053         void registerObject(KviKvsObject *pObject);
00054         void unregisterObject(KviKvsObject *pObject);
00055         void registerClass(KviKvsObjectClass *pClass);
00056         void unregisterClass(KviKvsObjectClass *pClass);
00057 public:
00058         void init();
00059         void deleteClass(KviKvsObjectClass * pClass);
00060         void clearInstances();
00061         void clearUserClasses();
00062         void flushUserClasses();
00063         void killAllObjectsWithClass(KviKvsObjectClass * pClass);
00064         KviKvsObjectClass * lookupClass(const QString &szClass,bool bBuiltinOnly = false);
00065         KviKvsObject * lookupObject(kvs_hobject_t hObject){ return m_pObjectDict->find(hObject); };
00066         KviPointerHashTable<void *,KviKvsObject> * objectDict(){ return m_pObjectDict; };
00067         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsObjectClass> * classDict(){ return m_pClassDict; };
00068 };
